description: Triangle of numbers maxfit[ i ][ j ] = upper bound on number of incidences in a geometry with <= i points and <= j blocks.
links: A. Betten and D. Betten, Linear spaces with at most 12 points, J. Combinatorial Designs, Volume 7, 1999, pp. 119 - 145.
author: Anton Betten (Anton.Betten(AT)uni-bayreuth.de)
